00037         class RigidBody;

00043         class Spring
00044         {
00045         public:
00046                 Spring() 
00047                 { 
00048                         m_Stiffness = k1;
00049                         m_Damping = k1;
00050                         m_RestLength = k1;
00051                         m_PrevLength = k1;
00052                         PMath::Zero(m_PosA);
00053                         PMath::Zero(m_PosB);
00054                         m_CenterAttachA = true;
00055                         m_CenterAttachB = true;
00056                         m_Compressible = true;
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 ~Spring() { }
00060
